<<<<<<< HEAD
Charles R. To our trustie and welbeloved, the Lord Major, aldermen, and sheriffs of our City of London. England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I) Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.
1 sheet ([1] p.)
by Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most Excellent Majestie: and by the assignes of John Bill, Imprinted at London : 1642.
"Given at our court at York the 14 day of June, in the 18 yeer of our reign. 1642". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======

by Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most Excellent Majestie: and by the assignes of John Bill, Imprinted at London : 1642.
"Given at our court at York the 14 day of June, in the 18 yeer of our reign. 1642". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
